descriptions.discovering: Discovering target audience and user needs...

featureCard.competitorInsight: This feature addresses competitor pain points

competitorAnalysis.enableAnalysisDescription: Enhance your roadmap with insights from competitor products
competitorAnalysis.identifiesCompetitors: Identifies 3-5 main competitors based on your project type
competitorAnalysis.searchesForFeedback: Searches app stores, forums, and social media for user feedback and pain points
competitorAnalysis.suggestsFeatures: Suggests features that address gaps in competitor products
competitorAnalysis.webSearchesDescription: This feature will perform web searches to gather competitor information. Your project name and type will be used in search queries. No code or sensitive data is shared.
competitorAnalysis.optionalInfo: You can generate a roadmap without competitor analysis if you prefer. The roadmap will still be based on your project structure and best practices.
competitorAnalysis.optionsDescription: This project has an existing competitor analysis from {{date}}
competitorAnalysis.useExistingDescription: Reuse the competitor insights you already have. Faster and no additional web searches.
competitorAnalysis.runNewDescription: Perform fresh web searches to get updated competitor information. Takes longer.
competitorAnalysis.skipDescription: Generate roadmap without any competitor insights.

existing.title: Competitor Analysis Options
existing.description: This project has an existing competitor analysis from {{date}}

useExisting.title: Use existing analysis
useExisting.description: Reuse the competitor insights you already have. Faster and no additional web searches.

runNew.title: Run new analysis
runNew.description: Perform fresh web searches to get updated competitor information. Takes longer.

skip.title: Skip competitor analysis
skip.description: Generate roadmap without any competitor insights.

viewer.title: Competitor Analysis Results
viewer.description: Analyzed {{count}} competitors to identify market gaps and opportunities

header.addFeatureTooltip: Add a new feature to the roadmap
header.competitorAnalysisTooltipContent: Analyzed {{count}} competitors with {{painPoints}} pain points identified

emptyState.title: No Roadmap Yet
emptyState.description: Generate an AI-powered roadmap that understands your project's target audience and creates a strategic feature plan.

featureCard.competitorInsightTooltip: This feature addresses competitor pain points

featureDetail.deleteDescription: This will permanently remove "{{title}}" from your roadmap.
